name: Luwin
quote: I pulled you into the world. Both of you. I've seen both your faces almost every day since, and for that I consider myself very, very lucky.
â€•Maester Luwin to Bran and Rickon Stark
description: Luwin was the Maester of Winterfell and a loyal servant to House Stark. He acted as a surrogate parent to Bran Stark and Rickon Stark in the absence of their family.
